name: Bicycle Repair Man! Windows
description:
GGJ 2020 Game Submission - Dave Sabre

Download the folder, Unzip, click on Bicycle Repair Man.exe - You won't need to open any other Unity applications. Enjoy!

Pedal your bike down a long narrow course, while keeping it repaired out of the red. Use A and D keys to turn the bike and pick up repair kits by driving over them. Use the R key to trigger a repair when your character turns red (He is low on health). This returns the bike to full health, but uses up one of your kits.
Make it to the end without running out of health to win, run out of health and you lose.
